verses.verse: וְאֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> now these הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> Now these [are] the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִנִּ֣יחַ <WH3240> left יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD לְנַסּ֥וֹת <WH5254> to prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not יָדְע֔וּ <WH3045> by them [even] as many [of Israel] as had not known אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> any מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <WH4421> all the wars כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

רַ֗ק <WH7535> Only that לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order דַּ֚עַת <WH1847> cunning דֹּר֣וֹת <WH1755> the generations בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְלַמְּדָ֖ם <WH3925> to teach מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> them war רַ֥ק <WH7535> but אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> at the least such as before לֹ֥א <WH3808> had not יְדָעֽוּם׃ <WH3045> might know

חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH2568> [Namely] five סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> and all the Canaanites וְהַצִּ֣ידֹנִ֔י <WH6722> and the Sidonians וְהַ֣חִוִּ֔י <WH2340> and the Hivites יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that dwelt הַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount הַלְּבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> Lebanon מֵהַר֙ <WH2022> from mount בַּ֣עַל חֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH1179> Baalhermon עַ֖ד <WH5704> far לְב֥וֹא <WH935> unto the entering in חֲמָֽת׃ <WH2574> of Hamath

וַֽיִּהְי֕וּ <WH1961> were for לְנַסּ֥וֹת <WH5254> And they were to prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel לָדַ֗עַת <WH3045> by them to know הֲיִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> whether they would hearken אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֣ת <WH4687> unto the commandments יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> which he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> their fathers בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> dwelt בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> among הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> the Canaanites הַחִתִּ֤י <WH2850> Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> and Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> and Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and Jebusites

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֵיהֶ֤ם <WH1323> their daughters לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> as לְנָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> to be their wives וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1323> their daughters נָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> and gave לִבְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1121> to their sons וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their gods פ

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> did בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הָרַע֙ <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <WH7911> and forgat אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <WH1168> Baalim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרֽוֹת׃ <WH842> and the groves

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was hot אַ֤ף <WH639> Therefore the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֗ם <WH4376> and he sold בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> them into the hand כּוּשַׁ֣ן רִשְׁעָתַ֔יִם <WH3573> of Chushanrishathaim מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרַ֣ם נַהֲרָ֑יִם <WH763> of Mesopotamia וַיַּעַבְד֧וּ <WH5647> served בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתַ֖יִם <WH3573> Chushanrishathaim שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <WH2199> cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> raised up יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <WH3467> a deliverer לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיּֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם <WH3467> who delivered אֵ֚ת <WH853> עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <WH6274> them [even] Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother כָלֵ֖ב <WH3612> Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֥ן <WH6996> younger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> came עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> over רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> came upon him and he judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> Israel וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> and went out לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to war וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> delivered יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> into his hand אֶת־ <WH853> כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתַ֖יִם <WH3573> Chushanrishathaim מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> Aram וַתָּ֣עָז <WH5810> prevailed יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> and his hand עַ֖ל <WH5921> over כּוּשַׁ֥ן רִשְׁעָתָֽיִם׃ <WH3573> against Chushanrishathaim

וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <WH8252> had rest הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> And the land אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיָּ֖מָת <WH4191> died עָתְנִיאֵ֥ל <WH6274> And Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְנַֽז׃ <WH7073> of Kenaz פ

וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְחַזֵּ֨ק <WH2388> strengthened יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> עֶגְל֤וֹן <WH5700> Eglon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel עַ֛ל <WH5921> against כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> because they had done אֶת־ <WH853> הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֣ף <WH622> And he gathered אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto him the children עַמּ֖וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> and Amalek וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> and smote אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וַיִּֽירְשׁ֖וּ <WH3423> and possessed אֶת־ <WH853> עִ֥יר <WH5892> the city הַתְּמָרִֽים׃ <WH8558> of the palm

וַיַּעַבְד֤וּ <WH5647> served בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> So the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> עֶגְל֣וֹן <WH5700> Eglon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years ס

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> But when the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיָּקֶם֩ <WH6965> raised them up יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD לָהֶ֜ם מוֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> a deliverer אֶת־ <WH853> אֵה֤וּד <WH164> Ehud בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרָא֙ <WH1617> of Gera בֶּן־ הַיְמִינִ֔י <WH1145> a Benjamite אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> a man אִטֵּ֖ר <WH334> left יַד־ <WH3027> and by him יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> left-handed וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> sent בְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּיָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> able מִנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> a present לְעֶגְל֖וֹן <WH5700> unto Eglon מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיַּעַשׂ֩ <WH6213> made ל֨וֹ אֵה֜וּד <WH164> But Ehud חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> him a dagger וְלָ֛הּ שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> which had two פֵי֖וֹת <WH6366> edges גֹּ֣מֶד <WH1574> of a cubit אָרְכָּ֑הּ <WH753> length וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <WH2296> and he did gird אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> מִתַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under לְמַדָּ֔יו <WH4055> it under his raiment עַ֖ל <WH5921> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <WH3409> thigh יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> upon his right

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> the present לְעֶגְל֖וֹן <WH5700> unto Eglon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מוֹאָ֑ב <WH4124> of Moab וְעֶגְל֕וֹן <WH5700> and Eglon אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man בָּרִ֖יא <WH1277> fat מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [was] a very

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he כִּלָּ֔ה <WH3615> And when he had made an end לְהַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> to offer אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> the present וַיְשַׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> he sent away אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <WH5375> that bare הַמִּנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> the present

וְה֣וּא <WH1931> himself שָׁ֗ב <WH7725> But he himself turned again מִן־ <WH4480> from הַפְּסִילִים֙ <WH6456> from the quarries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אֶת־ <WH854> were at הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> that [were] by Gilgal וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said דְּבַר־ <WH1697> errand סֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> I have a secret לִ֛י אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> for הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto thee O king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> who said הָ֔ס <WH2013> Keep silence וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> by him went out מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> And all that stood עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וְאֵה֣וּד ׀ <WH164> And Ehud בָּ֣א <WH935> came אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יֹ֠שֵׁב <WH3427> unto him and he was sitting בַּעֲלִיַּ֨ת <WH5944> parlour הַמְּקֵרָ֤ה <WH4747> in a summer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לוֹ֙ לְבַדּ֔וֹ <WH905> alone וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֵה֔וּד <WH164> which he had for himself alone And Ehud דְּבַר־ <WH1697> I have a message אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> from God לִ֖י אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> for וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> unto thee And he arose מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הַכִּסֵּֽא׃ <WH3678> out of [his] seat

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> put forth אֵהוּד֙ <WH164> And Ehud אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֣ד <WH3027> hand שְׂמֹאל֔וֹ <WH8040> his left וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> the dagger מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> and יֶ֣רֶךְ <WH3409> thigh יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> from his right וַיִּתְקָעֶ֖הָ <WH8628> and thrust בְּבִטְנֽוֹ׃ <WH990> it into his belly

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> also went in גַֽם־ <WH1571> also הַנִּצָּ֜ב <WH5325> And the haft אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הַלַּ֗הַב <WH3851> the blade וַיִּסְגֹּ֤ר <WH5462> closed הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> upon הַלַּ֔הַב <WH3851> the blade כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁלַ֛ף <WH8025> so that he could not draw הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> the dagger מִבִּטְנ֑וֹ <WH990> out of his belly וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> came out הַֽפַּרְשְׁדֹֽנָה׃ <WH6574> and the dirt

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth אֵה֖וּד <WH164> Then Ehud הַֽמִּסְדְּר֑וֹנָה <WH4528> through the porch וַיִּסְגֹּ֞ר <WH5462> and shut דַּלְת֧וֹת <WH1817> the doors הָעַלִיָּ֛ה <WH5944> of the parlour בַּעֲד֖וֹ <WH5774> brandish וְנָעָֽל׃ <WH5274> upon him and locked

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he יָצָא֙ <WH3318> When he was gone out וַעֲבָדָ֣יו <WH5650> his servants בָּ֔אוּ <WH935> came וַיִּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> and when they saw וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold דַּלְת֥וֹת <WH1817> that behold the doors הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <WH5944> of the parlour נְעֻל֑וֹת <WH5274> [were] locked וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> they said אַ֣ךְ <WH389> is only מֵסִ֥יךְ <WH5526> Surely he covereth ה֛וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> his feet בַּחֲדַ֥ר <WH2315> chamber הַמְּקֵרָֽה׃ <WH4747> in his summer

וַיָּחִ֣ילוּ <WH2342> And they tarried עַד־ <WH5704> until בּ֔וֹשׁ <WH954> till they were ashamed וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> did not פֹתֵ֖חַ <WH6605> and behold he opened דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> not the doors הָֽעֲלִיָּ֑ה <WH5944> of the parlour וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> therefore they took אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּפְתֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4668> a key וַיִּפְתָּ֔חוּ <WH6605> and opened וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold אֲדֹ֣נֵיהֶ֔ם <WH113> [them] and behold their lord נֹפֵ֥ל <WH5307> [was] fallen down אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> on the earth מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> dead

וְאֵה֥וּד <WH164> And Ehud נִמְלַ֖ט <WH4422> escaped עַ֣ד <WH5704> while הִֽתְמַהְמְהָ֑ם <WH4102> while they tarried וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> and he עָבַ֣ר <WH5674> and passed beyond אֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּסִילִ֔ים <WH6456> the quarries וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <WH4422> and escaped הַשְּׂעִירָֽתָה׃ <WH8167> unto Seirath

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בְּבוֹא֔וֹ <WH935> And it came to pass when he was come וַיִּתְקַ֥ע <WH8628> that he blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> a trumpet בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in the mountain אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <WH3381> went down עִמּ֧וֹ <WH5973> with בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> at הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> with him from the mount וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he in לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> and he before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to רִדְפ֣וּ <WH7291> unto them Follow אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> after כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> me for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <WH341> your enemies אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> the Moabites בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> into your hand וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <WH3381> And they went down אַחֲרָ֗יו <WH310> after וַֽיִּלְכְּד֞וּ <WH3920> him and took אֶת־ <WH853> מַעְבְּר֤וֹת <WH4569> the fords הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> of Jordan לְמוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> toward Moab וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and did not נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> and suffered אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> not a man לַעֲבֹֽר׃ <WH5674> to pass over

וַיַּכּ֨וּ <WH5221> And they slew אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> of Moab בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he כַּעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> about ten אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׁמֵ֖ן <WH8082> all lusty וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and all men חָ֑יִל <WH2428> of valour וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and no נִמְלַ֖ט <WH4422> and there escaped אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> not a man

וַתִּכָּנַ֤ע <WH3665> was subdued מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> So Moab בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under יַ֣ד <WH3027> under the hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <WH8252> had rest הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> And the land שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years ס

וְאַחֲרָ֤יו <WH310> And after הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came שַׁמְגַּ֣ר <WH8044> him was Shamgar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֲנָ֔ת <WH6067> of Anath וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> which slew אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> of the Philistines שֵֽׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men בְּמַלְמַ֖ד <WH4451> goad הַבָּקָ֑ר <WH1241> with an ox וַיֹּ֥שַׁע <WH3467> and he also delivered גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel ס
